00065         Layer::~Layer()
00066         {
00067         NodeItr itr = mNodes.begin(), itr_end = mNodes.end();
00068                 while (itr != itr_end)
00069                 {
00070             if (*itr)// player character may already have been deleted
00071                         delete (*itr);
00072                         ++itr;
00073                 }
00074         }

00076         void Layer::setTile(int x, int y, Texture *tex, int width, int height)
00077         {
00078             std::stringstream str;
00079             Point p;
00080 
00081             str << "tile" << x << "-" << y;
00082                 p.x = (x - y) * (width >> 1);
00083                 p.y = (x + y) * (height >> 1);
00084 
00085             // add node and set its position
00086         Node *node = graphicsEngine->createNode(str.str(), tex->getName(), &p);
00087         addNode(node);
00088         }
00089 
00090         void Layer::addNode(Node *node)
00091         {
00092         mNodes.push_back(node);
00093         }

00095         Node* Layer::getNodeAt(unsigned int x, unsigned int y)
00096         {
00097                 // iterators for searching through the list of tiles
00098                 std::list<Node*>::iterator itr = mNodes.begin();
00099                 std::list<Node*>::const_iterator itr_end = mNodes.end();
00100                 // The position to look at tile in
00101                 Point p;
00102                 p.x = x;
00103                 p.y = y;
00104 
00105                 while (itr != itr_end)
00106                 {
00107                         // Check whether the co-ordinates are inside the tile
00108                         if (checkInside(p, (*itr)->getBounds()))
00109                         {
00110                                 return (*itr);
00111                         }
00112                         ++itr;
00113                 }
00114                 return NULL;
00115         }

00130         bool Map::loadMap(const std::string &filename)
00131         {
00132             std::string file = resourceManager->getDataPath() + filename;
00133         logger->logDebug("Loading map " + file);
00134 
00135         TiXmlDocument doc(file.c_str());
00136         bool loaded = doc.LoadFile();
00137         if (!loaded)
00138         {
00139             logger->logError("Error loading map");
00140             return false;
00141         }
00142 
00143         TiXmlHandle hDoc(&doc);
00144         TiXmlElement *e;
00145         TiXmlHandle map = hDoc.FirstChild("map");
00146 
00147         if (!loadMapInfo(map.ToElement()))
00148         {
00149             return false;
00150         }
00151 
00152         int numTilesets = 0;
00153 
00154         while(1)
00155         {
00156             e = map.Child("tileset", numTilesets).ToElement();
00157 
00158             if (!loadTileset(e))
00159             {
00160                 break;
00161             }
00162             ++numTilesets;
00163         }
00164 
00165         if (numTilesets == 0)
00166         {
00167             logger->logError("No tilesets found.");
00168             return false;
00169         }
00170 
00171         int numLayers = 0;
00172         while(1)
00173         {
00174             e = map.Child("layer", numLayers).ToElement();
00175 
00176             if (!loadLayer(e))
00177             {
00178                 break;
00179             }
00180             ++numLayers;
00181         }
00182         if (numLayers == 0)
00183         {
00184             logger->logError("No layers found!");
00185             return false;
00186         }
00187 
00188         logger->logDebug("Finished loading map");
00189 
00190         return true;
00191     }

00193         bool Map::loadMapInfo(TiXmlElement* e)
00194         {
00195             if (!e)
00196         {
00197             logger->logError("Invalid map format");
00198             return false;
00199         }
00200 
00201             if (e->QueryIntAttribute("width", &mWidth) != TIXML_SUCCESS)
00202         {
00203             logger->logError("Invalid map width");
00204             return false;
00205         }
00206 
00207         if (e->QueryIntAttribute("height", &mHeight) != TIXML_SUCCESS)
00208         {
00209             logger->logError("Invalid map height");
00210             return false;
00211         }
00212 
00213         if (e->QueryIntAttribute("tilewidth", &mTileWidth) != TIXML_SUCCESS)
00214         {
00215             logger->logError("Invalid tile width");
00216             return false;
00217         }
00218 
00219         if (e->QueryIntAttribute("tileheight", &mTileHeight) != TIXML_SUCCESS)
00220         {
00221             logger->logError("Invalid tile height");
00222             return false;
00223         }
00224 
00225         return true;
00226         }
00227 
00228         bool Map::loadTileset(TiXmlElement *e)
00229         {
00230         if (!e)
00231         {
00232             return false;
00233         }
00234 
00235                 int id = 0;
00236                 if (e->QueryIntAttribute("firstgid", &id) != TIXML_SUCCESS)
00237                 {
00238                         logger->logError("No tile id found");
00239             return false;
00240                 }
00241 
00242                 int width = 0;
00243                 int height = 0;
00244                 if (e->QueryIntAttribute("tilewidth", &width) != TIXML_SUCCESS)
00245                 {
00246                         width = mTileWidth;
00247                 }
00248                 if (e->QueryIntAttribute("tileheight", &height) != TIXML_SUCCESS)
00249                 {
00250                         height = mTileHeight;
00251                 }
00252 
00253         e = e->FirstChild("image")->ToElement();
00254         if (!e)
00255         {
00256             logger->logError("No images for tilesets defined!");
00257             return false;
00258         }
00259 
00260                 std::string imagefile = e->Attribute("source");
00261 
00262         if (imagefile.empty())
00263         {
00264             logger->logError("No source for image");
00265             return false;
00266         }
00267 
00268         if (resourceManager->doesExist(imagefile))
00269         {
00270             imagefile.insert(0, resourceManager->getDataPath());
00271         }
00272 
00273         if (!graphicsEngine->loadTextureSet(imagefile, width, height))
00274         {
00275             logger->logError("Unable to load texture for map");
00276             return false;
00277         }
00278 
00279                 Tileset *tileset = new Tileset;
00280                 tileset->id = id;
00281                 tileset->width = width;
00282                 tileset->height = height;
00283                 tileset->tilename = imagefile;
00284                 mTilesets.push_back(tileset);
00285 
00286         return true;
00287         }
00288 
00289         bool Map::loadLayer(TiXmlElement *e)
00290         {
00291             if (!e)
00292         {
00293             return false;
00294         }
00295 
00296         int layerWidth, layerHeight;
00297 
00298         if (e->QueryIntAttribute("width", &layerWidth) != TIXML_SUCCESS)
00299         {
00300             logger->logError("No layer width");
00301             return false;
00302         }
00303 
00304         if (e->QueryIntAttribute("height", &layerHeight) != TIXML_SUCCESS)
00305         {
00306             logger->logError("No layer height");
00307             return false;
00308         }
00309 
00310         // Load in compressed base64 map
00311         e = e->FirstChild("data")->ToElement();
00312         const char *data = e->GetText();
00313         if (!data)
00314         {
00315             logger->logError("No data");
00316             return false;
00317         }
00318 
00319         // convert from base 64
00320         int length = Base64::decodeSize(strlen(data));
00321         unsigned char *compressedData = new unsigned char[length];
00322         compressedData = Base64::decode(data, compressedData);
00323 
00324         if (length == 0)
00325         {
00326             delete compressedData;
00327             logger->logError("Unable to convert from base64");
00328             return false;
00329         }
00330 
00331         unsigned char *layerData;
00332 
00333         unsigned int inflatedSize = Gzip::inflateMemory(compressedData, length, layerData);
00334 
00335         delete compressedData;
00336 
00337         if (inflatedSize == 0)
00338         {
00339             logger->logError("Unable to uncompress map data");
00340             return false;
00341         }
00342 
00343         addLayer(layerWidth, layerHeight, layerData, inflatedSize);
00344 
00345         return true;
00346         }
00347 
00348         void Map::addLayer(unsigned int width, unsigned int height, unsigned char *data,
00349                 unsigned int len)
00350     {
00351         Layer *l = new Layer(width, height);
00352 
00353         // load in the layer data
00354             int length = len - 3;
00355             int x = 0;
00356             int y = 0;
00357 
00358         for (int i = 0; i < length; i += 4)
00359         {
00360             // get the tile id by putting
00361             // the data bytes into an integer
00362             int tile_id = data[i] | data[i + 1] << 8 |
00363                             data[i + 2] << 16 | data[i + 3] << 24;
00364 
00365                         if (tile_id > 0)
00366                         {
00367                                 // search out the tilset the tile_id belongs to
00368                                 for (size_t j = mTilesets.size()-1; j >= 0; --j)
00369                                 {
00370                                         // since we are searching backwards,
00371                                         // we assume that the later tilesets
00372                                         // have a greater tile_id, when tile_id
00373                                         // is then greater, it means its part of the tileset
00374                                         if (tile_id >= mTilesets[j]->id)
00375                                         {
00376                                                 std::stringstream str;
00377                                                 str << mTilesets[j]->tilename << (tile_id - mTilesets[j]->id) + 1;
00378                                                 l->setTile(x, y, graphicsEngine->getTexture(str.str()), mTileWidth, mTileHeight);
00379                                                 break;
00380                                         }
00381                                 }
00382                         }
00383             ++x;
00384 
00385             // reached the end of the row
00386             if (x == mWidth)
00387             {
00388                 x = 0;
00389                 ++y;
00390 
00391                 // reached the end of the map
00392                 if (y == mHeight)
00393                     break;
00394             }
00395         }
00396 
00397         // finished with the data now, free it
00398         free(data);
00399 
00400         mLayers.push_back(l);
00401     }
